testsuite.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 3 out of 4 - step workFlow tests
Below test cases were added for PIPE-3850

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 3 out of 4 - step workFlow tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3850 S-WF-016. User verifies that all the steps in a pipeline which runs on a linux node, will get executed in the right order.
testcase.classname: S-WF-016. User verifies that all the steps in a pipeline which runs on a linux node, will get executed in the right order.

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 3 out of 4 - step workFlow tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3850 S-WF-017. User verifies that if there are steps grouped in an affinity group in a pipeline they all get executed in the same linux build node.
testcase.classname: S-WF-017. User verifies that if there are steps grouped in an affinity group in a pipeline they all get executed in the same linux build node.

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 3 out of 4 - step workFlow tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3850 S-WF-018. User verifies that if there are steps grouped in an affinity group in a pipeline which run on linux node, they all get executed in the correct order i.e. when their parent step(s) have executed.
testcase.classname: S-WF-018. User verifies that if there are steps grouped in an affinity group in a pipeline which run on linux node, they all get executed in the correct order i.e. when their parent step(s) have executed.

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 3 out of 4 - step workFlow tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3850 S-WF-019. User verifies that if there are steps grouped in an affinity group in a pipeline which run on linux node, with priority specified, they all get executed based on the priority when there are more than one step that can be executed.
testcase.classname: S-WF-019. User verifies that if there are steps grouped in an affinity group in a pipeline which run on linux node, with priority specified, they all get executed based on the priority when there are more than one step that can be executed.

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 3 out of 4 - step workFlow tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3850 S-WF-020. User verifies that if there are steps grouped in an affinity group in a pipeline which run on linux node, and one of the steps is failed, all the next steps should get skipped.
testcase.classname: S-WF-020. User verifies that if there are steps grouped in an affinity group in a pipeline which run on linux node, and one of the steps is failed, all the next steps should get skipped.
